entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
